title: Debugger fails to download plugins in OO Workflow Designer
content:
When installing OO Workflow Designer with a self-signed certificate, when debugging, an error is thrown stating that Maven cannot download dependencies due to the self-signed certificate.

Cause

Sometimes self-signed certificates can be incorrectly flagged as untrusted.

Solutions

In cases where working with self-signed certificates is mandatory, there are 2 possible solutions for this issue:

Solution 1

Add a new line in the designer-wrapper.conf file in the wrapper.java.additional section making sure to increment the last number: 

wrapper.java.additional.XX=-Dssl.support-self-signed=true

You must restart OO Workflow Designer after adding this line for the changes to take effect.

Solution 2

Import the Designer’s certificate into the client.truststore file using keytool under an alias that does not contain self-signed in the name.
For example:

 Keytool -importcer t -file <path_to_designer_certificate> - alias debugfix -keystore client.truststore

Restart is not required after importing the certificate into client.truststore.
